name: Browse For A Cause
tag_list: charity, nonprofit, clean-tech, environment, green, causes
overview:
Browse For A Cause is the easiest way to support your favorite charity. All you have to do is add the browser addon, and affiliate revenue (3-5%) of purchases on sites like Amazon is donated to the charity of your choice. It takes 30 seconds to get started, and you’ll never have to think about it again.

We have a White Label solution for charities to create their own branded addon - so interested charities should get in touch.
